pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Functional and Phylogenetic Patterns in Metacommunities // Analysis of metacommunities based on functional traits and phylogeny of the community components. The functions that are offered here implement for the R environment methods that have been available in the SYNCSA application written in C++ (by Valerio Pillar, available at http:// ecoqua.ecologia.ufrgs.br/ecoqua/SYNCSA.html).
